mapper.insert: insert into run_project (run_id, time_node, delay_time, start_time, get_time, overtime, score, progress) values (#{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into run_project
run_id,
time_node,
delay_time,
start_time,
get_time,
overtime,
score,
progress,
#{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{timeNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{getTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{overtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update run_project set time_node = #{timeNode} where run_id = #{runId}
mapper.update: update run_project set score=#{score} where run_id = #{runId}
update run_project set progress=#{progress} where run_id = #{runId}
mapper.select: SELECT progress FROM run_project WHERE run_id=#{runId}
select overtime from run_project where run_id=#{runId}
select team_id from undertake u left join run_project r on r.undertake_id=u.undertake_id where r.run_id=#{runId}
select undertake_id from run_project where run_id=#{runId}
SELECT time_node from run_project where run_id=#{runId}
